title: Hi? when will Riot fix "full screen" bug?
body:
Hi Riot

I don't know what ur guys doing, but i have suffered this for 2 weeks since 7.1. What u told me was changing to board less mode, but it really works bad on my mac. i just want to know if u r trying to fix this problem or leave it alone?

Thx

replies.body: Our teams are still looking into a permafix for the issue. We deployed a fix that resolved the issue for some players, but we're still looking to solve it for everyone. Since I'm not on the teams that work on these fixes, I can't provide more of an update than this, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
